verses.verse: שִׁ֣ירוּ <WH7891> O sing לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> song חָדָ֑שׁ <WH2319> a new שִׁ֥ירוּ <WH7891> sing לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> all the earth

שִׁ֣ירוּ <WH7891> Sing לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> bless שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> his name בַּשְּׂר֥וּ <WH1319> shew forth מִיּֽוֹם־ <WH3117> from day לְ֝י֗וֹם <WH3117> to day יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> his salvation
סַפְּר֣וּ <WH5608> Declare בַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> among the heathen כְּבוֹד֑וֹ <WH3519> his glory בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָֽ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> among all people נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> his wonders

כִּ֥י <WH3588> For גָ֘ד֤וֹל <WH1419> [is] great יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <WH1984> to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and greatly נוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> he [is] to be feared ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> above all gods

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> for all אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> For all the gods הָעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> of the nations אֱלִילִ֑ים <WH457> [are] idols וַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> but the LORD שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> the heavens עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> made
הוֹד־ <WH1935> Honour וְהָדָ֥ר <WH1926> and majesty לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> [are] before עֹ֥ז <WH5797> him strength וְ֝תִפְאֶ֗רֶת <WH8597> and beauty בְּמִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH4720> [are] in his sanctuary

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> Give לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> O ye kindreds עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> of the people הָב֥וּ <WH3051> give לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> glory וָעֹֽז׃ <WH5797> and strength

הָב֣וּ <WH3051> Give לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> [due unto] his name שְׂאֽוּ־ <WH5375> bring מִ֝נְחָ֗ה <WH4503> an offering וּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and come לְחַצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH2691> into his courts

הִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> O worship לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <WH1927> in the beauty קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of holiness חִ֥ילוּ <WH2342> fear מִ֝פָּנָ֗יו <WH6440> before כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> him all the earth

אִמְר֤וּ <WH559> Say בַגּוֹיִ֨ם ׀ <WH1471> among the heathen יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD מָלָ֗ךְ <WH4427> reigneth אַף־ <WH637> Indeed תִּכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> also shall be established תֵּ֭בֵל <WH8398> the world בַּל־ <WH1077> lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> that it shall not be moved יָדִ֥ין <WH1777> he shall judge עַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH5971> the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> righteously

יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <WH8055> rejoice הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> Let the heavens וְתָגֵ֣ל <WH1523> be glad הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> and let the earth יִֽרְעַ֥ם <WH7481> roar הַ֝יָּ֗ם <WH3220> let the sea וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃ <WH4393> and the fulness

יַעֲלֹ֣ז <WH5937> be joyful שָׂ֭דַי <WH7704> Let the field וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֑וֹ אָ֥ז <WH227> Then יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> rejoice כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> and all that [is] therein then shall all the trees יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> of the wood

לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> Before יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֬י <WH3588> for בָ֗א <WH935> for he cometh כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בָא֮ <WH935> for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <WH8199> to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <WH8199> he shall judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> and the people בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH530> with his truth
